alert.note: Alert for Butts; Fayette; Jasper; Lamar; Pike; Putnam; Spalding (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 20 at 7:32PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Spalding, Baldwin, southeastern Fayette, Putnam, Pike, southwestern Hancock, Monroe, southern Butts, Jones, southern Jasper and Lamar Counties through 815 PM EDT... At 731 PM EDT, National Weather Service doppler radar indicated strong winds ahead of a line of thunderstorms along a line extending from near Eatonton to near McElheneys Crossroads to Digbey, and moving southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...40 to 50 mph wind preceding rain or lightning. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Strong winds will occur before any rain or lightning. Do not wait for the sound of thunder before taking cover. Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Griffin, Milledgeville, Barnesville, Eatonton, Forsyth, Gray, Zebulon, Flovilla, Milner, Brooks, Molena, Williamson, Orchard Hill, Meansville, Aldora, East Griffin, Phoenix, Midway-Hardwick, Meriwether and Concord. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 100 AM EDT for central, north central, west central and east central Georgia.

area.areaDesc: Butts; Fayette; Jasper; Lamar; Pike; Putnam; Spalding
